channel.title: I need help with adding stuff to my server
channel.description:
hello basicly i need help with my new server its up and running but i need to add items to shops and block certain spells and maybe even add more npc's if u know how i can do this and u have msn then please add twigy2@hotmail.com
many thx UFO

item.title: I need help with adding stuff to my server
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

There are tons of tutorials on this kind of thing.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with adding stuff to my server
item.dc:creator: @iKolli iKolli`
item.description:
@iKolli wrote:

In your server file you should find something like shops.cfg.
Open that up to add a new shop/edit an existing shop.

Also, some servers have a folder called “config” or maybe “cfg”. So there should be a shop.cfg somewhere in your source.

Let’s say this was the format:

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount

Then you could put something like this:

shop = ID  	Shop_Name_With_Underscores					2	2	055	15000	itemid 	15000

etc.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with adding stuff to my server

item.title: I need help with adding stuff to my server
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

To add items to shops, just go into shops.cfg and find the store you want to edit. Then add the item Id and the amounts.

Read full topic
